item.title: Lab Accreditation
item.description: Q: Why is lab accreditation so important? A: What is lab accreditation? # ISO 17025 is the standard for laboratory competence. It is about lab quality management system. PDCA: Plan-Do-Check-Act confidence to the data. What does a lab get out of lab accreditation? # for lab, management component and technical component. By following the requirements, methods were developed and validated. Run PT samples. , continuous improvement. What does a client get out of lab accreditation?
